## Khatri-pck
This is an example project demonstrating how to publish a python module to PyPI.

## Installation

Run the following to install:
``` python
pip install khatri-pck
```

## Usage

```python
from helloworld import say_hello

# Generate "Hello, World!..."
say_hello()

#Generate "Hello, XYZ!..."
say_hello("XYZ")
```
